description:
Inspired by runners, then refined to offer the versatility to handle a wide range of high-output mountain activities, the Cormac is designed for performance, sun protection, and comfort. Its 100% recycled Phasic™ LT fabric wicks moisture, breathes, provides UPF 50+ protection, and is treated for odour resistance. The fit maximizes airflow and moves with your body, the low-profile collar layers comfortably, and the seam design minimizes friction.

Updated with a new high-performance recycled fabric and a more comfortable collar design.
name: Arcteryx Cormac Crew LS - Mens

specs.value: Phasic™ LT with DAO™ - 100% polyester (80% recycled content)
